title: Prob best fetcher for MAL
comment: Tried MAL unofficial and others too but this one is the best one out there.

title: Very handy
comment: Amazing app. I am using it for some time now and it is undeniably the best tool to log my anime and manga without using MAL website. I'd like to commend the developer for constant performance and interface improvements. Good job!
Does not work
Send an e-mail and we'll try to help you out! - Michael
Boooooooooi
Could you expand on why you rated us so low? - Michael

title: Good App!!
comment: Well,,had a lot of advantage..Nd I feel like it's worth installing.. 😉

title: Great
comment: I installed the beta for more feature that will come here in the future

title: Loading
comment: Loading took forever and so far I have not managed to view any anime because I have not had the time to wait for it to load
We're sorry to hear about the slow speed. Send us an e-mail and we'll try to help you out. Also, keep in mind that this is *not* a streaming application. We don't provide anime video. - Michael

title: Could Be Better
comment: Aside from the minor negative of the Holo-esque sliding tabs, the app just needs to create more efficient use of space. The anime pages are fragmented into multiple tabs, with little information displayed. The general Material Design elements are very much appreciated, but there is further work to be done in that regard. (*nudge* You could add an option for light cards for the main pages! *wink*) Nonetheless, it's a good MAL client!
We're working on many design updates for a future release. It will likely be after the next release, where we've been working on adding features and support for AniList. - Michael

title: i m giving it two stars because........
comment: look it's good app but it would be a better hell the best app in the f**king world if u let us watch anime or read manga. do that and it can be 10 times better than crunchyroll

Sorry, but we don't have licenses to stream anime or display manga. If you have a few million dollars (US) for licensing costs and translation staff, maybe we could figure something out? Until then, we're just trying to be a good mobile interface for tracking what you're watching/reading. - Michael

title: Advice
comment: No doubt, it's an amazing app, easy to use. But I recently found out that you can edit the cover image from the side by adding the picture URL. I was wondering if there is a way that I can edit my profile from the app.
Not at this time. Our API doesn't support it. Perhaps in a future update. - Michael

title: can't log in, needs facebook login
comment: so hard to log in with Facebook, can't acces with my current account, plus the internet suddenly becomes slow

If you have created the account by using a social service, go to the MAL website, edit your profile, go to the account tab, and establish a new password. You can use that for logging into the application. - Michael

title: Great MAL client.
comment: My preferred My Anime List app. Very fast and easy to update my anime when  away from the pc.

title: What the FUUUUUUUUUUCK
comment: Worst app fuck this sing up log in sorry your name is incorrect fuck this shit
Sorry to hear about your problems. If you still want to try, send an e-mail and we'll see if we can fix things for you. - Michael

title: Fantastic App
comment: Been using this app for some time now. Makes keeping track of anime/manga a nonissue. Also the beautiful and practical interface makes this the top app.
Great

title: Not working
comment: I don't know why but when I try to get in to anime  it just won't load no matter how many times I load
Send us an e-mail and we'll try to help you with the issue. - Michael

title: READ this
comment: Y do u have to make an account? It's  stupid! All you r doing is watching anime!sifm!
You need an account because this is just an application that uses MyAnimeList. That requires an account. - Michael

title: NICE!!!
comment: Good job :)

title: Hummingbird support
comment: Please!
You may want to look at Tenpenchii. It has awesome support for Hummingbird. - Michael

title: Everything looks great!
comment: The only problem I have is that it's not showing things I'm rewatching. Like SnK is under completed instead of in progress. I've only ever used the MAL app on my iPod bc the one for Android was too different but this is almost better so far. And TAGS omg there are no tags and I live for them! I keep all my thoughts and junk there!

Some additional things with personal details will be included in the next major release. You may want to look at our beta, which includes all that already. If you still have issues with rewatching there, let us know by e-mail. - Michael
Don't like it... delete
We'd really appreciate if you would let us know what you didn't like so we can improve the application. - Michael

title: This app is grt
comment: But lack one thing. If you could add club feature it would be great. Good luck. We will be waiting to hear from you. For now i will give 4🌟 once you add club option 5🌟 is for you.
We'll try to get to that at some point. MAL doesn't offer any direct access to most of their features, so we have to code everything from scratch. - Michael

title: YEEEES!!!!
comment: This is brilliant!! I've always needed an app that would make MAL using easier on phone!!! thank you!!

title: Almost perfect!
comment: App looks and runs good. Very handy! It'd be perfect if every option you can find on the website (like ticking "rewatching") was implemented in the app! edit: thanks for the reply!
That's coming in a future update. We have to make sure the interface code works first. - Michael

title: Trash
comment: This app is nothing compared to #Animania
This is 10 times better than all the other anime apps , this actually has the animes I want and not just a tiny limited selection.  5 stars!
Please keep in mind that this isn't a video player. It just manages lists of what you're watching or reading. That said, thank you for the review. - Michael

title: Watching?
comment: How do I watch anime or read manga on this?? Is this app only for making/managing lists??

You'll need to create an account on myanimelist.net. The "create an account" link should work, but if not, browse to their website and register there. Make sure to use a direct account. We currently have no way to handle the Facebook/Twitter/Google login styles. If you have questions, send us a message. - Michael

Nice, clean and simple MAL client. Something Dreadful has created Something Awesome. Sync is fast for me, (wifi, 40mbit), no startup issues on Android 5.0.2. Only one suggestion so far: Add a +1 button to the anime tile instead of in a submenu, and change the sub menu button for +1 to the dialogue to change the watch count and status. In my case, as I update MAL not every watched EP i'd have to tap+slide trough roughly 5 screens to get to the watch status and EP count, which IMO should be easier to reach. Also, maybe a feature request system in-app with a list of requests and request progress if being worked on, and a vote system could help for either only the beta, or both beta and release version.

title: Idiot app
comment: This app need account fuck dumb and I'm done to create it only work in Website useless apps JUST DELETE THIS APP.
Sorry you feel that way. - Michael

title: Its good
comment: But a slite few buggs will make it 5 stars

title: Internet connection?
comment: Getting error all the time: could not load details...yada yada. Im on my wifi network, tried 4g LTE to no avail. I was really hoping be able to use this app.
Send an e-mail and we'll get some more details to try and fix this issue for you. - Michael

title: Thanks
comment: I've been keeping a list of anime and manga that I've watched /read since 2012. It took up 5 pages. This app makes my life easy. The only problem is that I can't edit my profile with this app. XD

title: Great app! However...
comment: There's this bug that sometimes I enter the app and my manga list shows the same content as my anime list. The only way to reestablish the lists is to close the app and reopen it. It's not a big deal, but it also happens whenever I go to another app on my phone and then go back to Atarashii. Also, sometimes when it's doing the auto update, the Atarashii icon will stay in my notification bar until I update the lists manually. Those bugs are kind of annoying, but besides that I love the app :)
We think we found the cause of the issue, and it'll be fixed in an upcoming 2.1 release. - Michael

title: Great!
comment: But... can you allow me to see my friends lists via the app? Thanks!

title: Is this suitable for watching anime?
comment: I just downloaded it today and the manga is perfect but the prob is when i clicked on watching an anime it says my wifi connection is weak. I had already checked my wifi connection a lot times (err it can load pic why not vid?) Idk just asking if this app is suitable for watching. And i really hope vids can be downloaded

This is not a video player. It simply manages lists of what you're currently watching. It's great if you tend to watch a bunch of series together. If you want to watch anime, there are some great apps for that already. - Michael

Awesome conversion of MAL in an app. I can update my progress of anime and manga conveniently and without the hassle of updating it through a web browser on my mobile device or on my computer later. I do hope though that a later update will add the function to search through genres. Best MAL out there. Looking forward to more updates.

title: Giving connection problem, although my connection is A-okay
comment: Fix it michael
Send me some information and we'll look into it. Unfortunately, I can't reproduce the problem myself. - Michael

title: Couldn't load
comment: When I want to open an anime it says can't load please check internet connection but my internet is working just fine can you please fix it its a really great app but I just ask for that one thing to be fixed.
Please send an e-mail to us. We can't reproduce the problem, but we know it's there. If you can help out, we can find the cause to fix it. - Michael

title: I cannot watch video
comment: It always says:Could not load details please check your internet connection
This won't play video. It's not designed for that. If you are interested in managing a list of what you're watching, send an e-mail and help us track down the cause of the issue. - Michael
can't let me open.....
Please contact us with some more details. We're happy to help. - Michael
Connection please...
Please contact us to help us find the cause of the problem. - Michael

title: Looks good, but cant figure it out
comment: Is this app for watching anime? Because I thought it was and I dont know how to watch it on this app

This application is only designed to be a mobile-friendly native application to manage lists showing what you're watching/watched (or reading). It is not a streaming application. There are some great legal streaming services like Crunchyroll and Funimation that you could look at. - Michael

title: It's great but could be better...
comment: Really love the interface and style of the app, but still can use some adjustments and fixes. For one, there's the images. Glad the image loading time's faster now, but the thumbnail can almost never fully load for all lists in offline. Not much of a problem, but you could do something so that the thumbnails are downloaded and properly saved in a folder for offline use. That could be pretty great. While I'm at it, maybe you could try and 'link' MALgraph to the app for easy access... if that's even possible.

Offline image loading depends on a lot of things, including the MAL CDN allowing caching. In some cases, it does not, and our downloader respects that setting. In those cases it won't show offline as it can't be cached. MALgraph is shutting down July 1, so we won't be making any use of it. - Michael

title: Good, but..
comment: My complaint is that it keeps scrolling up or down because it thinks I'm hitting the scroll bar and not the menu button for updating the chapter I'm on. Maybe move the button over a bit more or move the scroll bar to the left side? The problem continues to be a severe annoyance every time I want to update a series. Please make the buttons either bigger or move them to the other side. I have skinny fingers and this still happens ALL the time. GalaxyS5
I'll file a bug for this. - Michael

title: Great BUT THIS NEEDS AN EXPLICIT CONTENT FILTER!
comment: When searching for manga there were many times where I have come across content which is pretty hentai, I do not wish to see this and I really think this is why it needs a explicit content filter.
I don't know that MAL has a common way to tell. If you know of consistent way to tell, send an e-mail and we'll see if we can add the option to a future version. - Michael
Nice.

title: auto synchronization
comment: I disabled auto synch and it still opens up every second in the background and tries to auto synch please fix. Samsung Galaxy s6 edge.
It shouldn't normally run every second. You may want to uninstall and reinstall the application. - Michael
Awsome interface and everything. But at RANDOM times it just says "problem connecting", WTF!

MAL is having major problems today and it's impacting all applications that connect to it. Unfortunately, we can't do much about their site. You can monitor our twitter account (https://twitter.com/atarashiiapp) for updates. - Michael

title: Nice app
comment: Everything is OK now, but the covers disappear after 10 days from being offline. A solution to that bug will be good. Does the cleaner have a hand in that ?

The cache for downloaded images will expire eventually, and there isn't much we can do about that. MAL actually tries to set an expiration in the past to prevent cover caching, and the system libraries tend to respect this. - Michael

title: I like it except for...
comment: How do watch the shows and/or read the manga you click on? That is my only question. Or you don't and you only receive reviews?

This is simply a mobile front-end for MAL (and soon, AniList). You can track what you're watching or reading, but we don't provide a way to watch directly. There are some great legal services like Crunchyroll and Funimation for watching, even with no-cost options. - Michael

title: THIS APPLICATION MAKE ME FRUSTRATED !
comment: WHAT CONNECTION DO YOU WANT ?! SPEEDY INTERNET CONNECTION ?! ARGHH ! COME ON ! DON'T MAKE ME ANGRY ! I REALLY HAVE IT !

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE send us an e-mail so we can get your problem fixed. There's probably a connection problem between you and the API server, but we won't know and can't find the issue if you never e-mail us. - Michael

title: Love it!
comment: I love the new update. Finally I can edit what day I started and finished a series. That was truly the only thing that was bugging me. I had to go to the website to put that in. I love the new pages too where you can edit everything in your list. Awesome job!

title: Not working at the moment
comment: I can't load information about any anime or manga. It says to check my connection but it doesn't seem to work on any working WiFi or mobile connection

title: Great design but a few bugs
comment: I'm running into the same bugs as derek chan where my anime list shows instead of the manga list. Seems to consistently happen if I view an anime or manga's details by tapping on it in my list and then go back to my list. Also happens if I go to my phone's home screen and reopen the app from my recent apps list. I'm running KitKat on a Maxx HD. I hope this help you track down the bug.

title: Its really great but im having some bugs
comment: Like the new version where I can't see my manga list, when I swipe right it's still the anime list. Also some pictures from anime won't show

I've seen this a few times, but can never reproduce it for testing. If you back out to the home screen and launch again, it should be okay. Pictures may or may not load depending on if there are issues with the MAL CDN. I've seen that happen more recently than in the past. - Michael

title: Superb app
comment: Everything you need to keep track of the anime you watch... manga too

title: Great app but,
comment: Occasionally when I go to update a volume number for a manga in the app it crashes. Just wanted to let you know. Other than that I love the app, very easy way to update MAL.

title: Awesome app. The latest update is bug free and very well optimised for me
comment: Loving the latest integration. Eliminating the need of many other apps.
Thank you for the support. - Michael
Great app

title: Question...?
comment: The app is very beautiful and it has all the Animes I'm searching for but ummm...you can't watch Anime here? Is it only for managing or keeping track of what episode you're in? Cause I'm really confused...please answer. c: EDIT: Oh, I see. Thanks for taking your time in answering and for telling me a good service to watch Anime, it is much appreciated.

Yes, this application is *only* for tracking what you're watching/reading. It is an unofficial client for MyAnimeList. If you want to watch anime or read manga, there are many good services like Crunchroll. - Michael

title: Ideas
comment: On the next update could you include the ability to see the recent added on top of the list / recent to oldest
I don't know if we even have a reliable way to get that data from the website. If we can, it may turn up eventually. - Michael
Wow
Excellent! ✨

title: Improve this app
comment: I can't load the information when I tap the anime it always ask me to have better connection. My Internet is fine but this shows up please fix it
If you're still having issues, send an e-mail and I'll see if I can help figure out the cause. - Michael

title: I would be great but...
comment: A sorting feature would be nice. Besides that, the app is great

title: Couldnt get it to work for some reason
comment: I really like the design and user friendliness of it. But I couldnt get it to load the anime I wanted to watch to make my list.
Maybe I'm misunderstanding, but we don't load videos. We're just an Android front-end for the MAL website. If I misunderstood, just send an e-mail with your problem and I'll try to help. - Michael

title: Here to stay
comment: As someone who's loved the UI even when there was no search feature, I'm liking everything you guys are doing with the app. However, with the major update I'm feeling a little empty now that I can't see the numbers when I rate things.  Keep up the good work!
Sorry about that. The numbers disappeared when we did the majority of the design re-work. I miss them too. They may be back in a future release, if we can find a way to make it look good. - Michael
Flawless

title: Wow
comment: It doesn't add it, if i search for something then press on plus and fill out all the details, it doesn't add it on to my list, its broken, its so pretty now but its broken for me :(   -Update I have sent some screenshot to the email.

Can you send a set of the exact steps you use to add to the e-mail address on our store listing? I'll go through the steps on my side and see what's going on. Make sure to state some of the titles, too. - Michael

title: A beautiful new update
comment: Love it! Now if you put complete it would go 13/13 itself ~ Im really happy of this update :3
I'm not sure what you mean by 13/13, but I'm glad you're enjoying it. - Michael
Search seems to be working on my test. Send an e-mail or tweet with your search terms and I'll look into it. - Michael

title: Small change request
comment: I love the new design! There's one thing that I wish was different. I think it would be more intuitive to switch the list change button and the tabs for Anime/Manga. Having Watching, Planned, etc. on the tabs would keep the user within the same category instead of switching Anime or Manga lists.

I remember mentioning that to one of the devs, and it was somewhat challenging to do it that way. Send an e-mail or post a request on our GitHub project and maybe it can be checked into again. - Michael

title: Feature request
comment: Could you please add a custom view? I'd love to get a planned+ in progress /watching view.
I'm not sure we'll do that soon, but if we run out of other things to implement (forum, extra title details, etc.) that's certainly a good idea. - Michael

title: The User Interface is pretty
comment: and runs smoothly. This app is great for keeping my anime/manga list up to date! Good job on keeping this app updated and fixing issues quickly! This current update is great!
Thanks! Our contributors did some awesome work to make this a solid release. I can't wait until you see what is planned for the next big update! - Michael

title: Repeated crashing
comment: App looks great, but once I decided to reinstall it and login with my MAL account the syncing makes the app crash everytime and I can't use the app because of this
Try our new version. It's had extensive changes to make the update process stable. - Michael

comment: It crashes everytime it tries to sync
Try our new version. It's had extensive changes to make the update process stable. - Michael
It's great, but it crashes after I make an update to an anime or manga. Please help fix
Try our new version. It's had extensive changes to make the update process stable. - Michael

title: Was great
comment: now unable to sync, thus this has no point
Try the beta version of our application. Sync has been greatly improved on it. - Michael

title: Great!
comment: Best MAL app for the android. It's only flaw is it's constant crashing.

title: It wont install
comment: Waiting for an hour still not installed
Sounds like a play store issue, they handle the download and install. You can try again in a bit and see if Google fixed it. - Michael

title: Awesome
comment: Atarashii is like MALU for android, without the automation, of course. It would be nice to see a media/folder indexer so Atarashii could update automatically.
Working fine now thanks - might have been a hiccup
If you're still having issues, please contact by e-mail. Our server was down for about 25 minutes while getting things ready for the upcoming 2.0 release. - Michael

title: love it
comment: its awesome but you need to add folders so people can make folders and list the anime like a specific anime and all of its seasons

That may be a bit difficult to do, as there is no place to store that kind of information in MyAnimeList itself, and local storage only means you can't sync it across devices or backup reliably. Basically, if MyAnimeList doesn't support it, we probably won't add it in without a lot of thought. - Michael

title: Amazing MAL app
comment: This app is really good and works like a charm. Really nice interface and so much better than the other mal apps on the playstore. Ps thanks for the reply and quick fix. Everything is great again. And good Luck trying to make everything work with the new mal website haha. That's gonna be a pain.
Well, hopefully among the updates there will be an API we can use directly. Until then, we can handle most changes by updating the server piece. - Michael

title: Crashes all the time
comment: Love the layout. But Everytime I'm about to add something to the list it crashes. It's very annoying :/

title: Crashes Alot
comment: This app is really great, Helps me keep record of all the animes I've watched and going to watch if it stopped crashing everytime I Click to view an anime to rate it or select it status, Fix it Developers! Its really annoying if it crashes frequently again and again.

We're working on a major update that should be very stable due to a bunch of changes and fixes. If you want to try it out, install the beta edition of this application. You can find it published under the same account. - Michael
Enjoyable visualization. Easy comfortable control. :)

title: Sony Xperia Acro S (LT26w)
comment: Плюсы: добрый перевод на русский язык, статистика профиля, просмотр базовой информации об аниме в самой программе, настройка текста для расшаривания. Минусы: лишь частично черная цветовая тема, 5-балльная оценка вместо 10-балльной на сайте, нет поиска по комментариям, нет самих комментариев - их отображения и правки, нет кнопки Выход с выгрузкой приложения из памяти, чекбоксы списков сбивают с толку, поскольку традиционно обозначают возможность множественного выбора. В данном случае убрали бы их вообще, оставив подсветку текущего. Лишние разрешения (доступ к USB-накопителю и NFC).

Thank you for your feedback. Android normally handles application closing, so we don't need an exit option. NFC is used for sharing items from the application to other devices and storage is needed to cache the cover images. Our API doesn't support comments yet.
I cant search api is broken edit ok
An update to the MAL website broke some things. We worked around it and sent a message to let MAL know. If you continue to have issues, please contact us by e-mail or over Twitter. - Michael

title: Works fine
comment: Works as intended
We've worked around the ban for now while waiting on response from MAL's owners, so the application should work properly for the near future. - Michael

title: So...
comment: It used to work perfectly fine until the crashing became a huge problem. Whenever I try to edit my "completed" or "on hold" list, it crashes continously. Now I can't even edit my current readings without it crashing. I have tried to uninstall and install again but it wouldn't allow me to login. It says "hold on a few sec" & I'm stuck at the loading page, unable to move forward.
There were a few issues earlier with MAL, causing the API to not connect. This should now be resolved. - Michael

It was working fine..until a few minutes ago. It crashes often yes, but I could've dealt with it. But it won't let me search any anime or manga, when I search it says "No anime or manga exists. Either the API server is broken, or you can't spell." Something like that. And clearly the animes I search exist.. This was a good app to use too, what a shame.

title: Good.
comment: Does its job. Could be much improved.
Please send your ideas to the contact e-mail. We won't know what you'd like improved unless you tell us. - Michael

title: I wish I could give it 5 stars...
comment: I liked this app quite a bit from the layout and ease of use to the aesthetics of it but it crashed way too frequently for me.
Most of the crashes should be fixed in the next release, where we've changed a lot of the code to better handle issues. - Michael

title: Perfect
comment: This app is perfect for everything I need. It looks nice, has a nice feel, and is easy maneuver around the app. If I may make a suggestion , add a feature in the planned to watch section to quick add it to watching. It saves the hassle of going into that one specific anime, and having to switch it. Anyway thanks again for the great app.

title: Liking it
comment: The outfit is simple and clean, easy to use. It would be better when you press complete, it would automatically put 12/12 etc. Otherwise recommended!  Looking foward for new updates.

title: Great app
comment: Useful to have if you watch a lot of anime like me.

title: It could be better
comment: It could be better if syncing could be faster, like other MAL apps it doesnt take long to update a list or load one...
Good but crashes ever time i try to rate an anime
That's interesting. Can you send some details using the contact information on our store listing? - Michael

title: Good but...
comment: Ok, the app is great. I really love it. The design and everything is perfect. It might be my phone, but when I open the side menu and I click on one of the options, it goes all white and it takes 5minutes to load the results. In the end, it doesn't even work. Same goes for the search. It wasn't doing this before so i doubt its my phone. I tried redownload the app and everything and the problem is still there. My lists are fine and everything linked to my account works great. I can't browse if you want

It may be related to MyAnimeList. Sometimes they make changes or their site has issues and it breaks our API server. Right now, I can access the various lists. If you're still having issues, please contact atarashii (at) animeneko (dot) net or @AtarashiiApp on Twitter and we'll try to fix it with your help. - Michael

title: Doesn't always sync with MAL
comment: Doesn't always sync with MAL. Doesn't report errors when sync fails

title: Nice app
comment: Loved the interface and easy to use
Crashes
We'd love to help, but we need to know more. Feel free to use the contact methods on the application listing here to send us details. - Michael

title: Nice

title: Keeps crashing.

title: Closing?
comment: I really like this app but lately it closes very often without warning. Usually after I search for something   or click on one of the searches it will force close the app, please fix this problem soon, this is the best I found on the store and I really want to keep using this app.

That said, we've had some problems on the connection to MAL lately, and that could be affecting stability. If you can reproduce it easily, contact me at motokochan (at) animeneko )dot( net or @atarashiiapp on Twitter. -Michael

title: Everything is good except 1 thing...
comment: Well, other than the more often crashing it does, there is something else I dont like about this app, which is the rating system. For MAL ratings, I'd like to know the specific score it has, not just rounding it off into a star. For my ratings however, I'm fine with stars, but I'd prefer 10 stars over 5 since the rating is out of 10, not 5 (a half a star doesn't look good in my opinion).

We'll be adding some analytics in the next release to hopefully track application issues more closely. That said, we've had some problems on the connection to MAL lately, and that could be affecting stability.

Unfortunately, there isn't room for 10 stars without them being really small, but we can look into a way to display the raw score. -Michael

title: Good, but needs to improve
comment: In my list, it must display everything but organized ! That mean what I'm watching first , the completed, droped and plan to watch. So I hate the way it make us confused, please update the app and give us more better UI .

We will look into more filtering and sorting options in the future. For now, you can see the titles in each status by selecting the type you would like. For every type, including "everything", it will display the titles sorted alphabetically. - Michael

title: Fixed :)
comment: This app is definitely the best one in the store. The interface is simple and easy to use, plus it's visually appealing.
We have been having problems contacting MyAnimeList from our API server. There is now a workaround in place, but it is only temporary until the issues can be fixed. Please try again. - Michael

title: Probably is good
comment: It looks and sounds good but is crashing every time I try to interact with it in any way :(. I hope you'll update it shortly, although the last time was three months ago. And yes I'm sending crash reports.
We have been having problems contacting MyAnimeList from our API server. There is now a workaround in place, but it is only temporary until the issues can be fixed. Please try again. - Michael

title: nice!
comment: its perfect
Best MAL client on Android

title: Thank you.
comment: Now I don't have to visit the website that always booted me for no reason.

title: Perfect
comment: This is the real MAL for Android, it syncs with the server in one touch and it is very easy to add/update/manage your list. I really loved it.

title: Good on my Tablet, but...
comment: crashed on my phone after logging in. I sent a crash report, but I wouldn't be surprised if it is my phone.
Much better than the old app and I love it a lot

title: Crash
comment: Need to fix it first.. When I log in it crashed..

title: Details
comment: would be better if there were descriptive stats. e.g  Start and Finnish dates, Genres ect ...missing a star ;(

title: Indispensable
comment: I've toyed around with Hummingbird for its' nicer looking interface, but it doesn't yet compare to the powerhouse that is MAL. This app is easy to navigate and looks great, making MAL a pleasure once again.

title: Great app
comment: Maybe you can add rank,popularity,recommendation,etc
We're working on adding some of those things in the next release. - Michael

title: Thank God I found this
comment: After all of my troubles with pocket Mal,  I deserved to find this app,  with a beautiful design,  and quick and easy usage. Thanks

title: It's fantastic
comment: Looks great, easy to use, and the developer is willing to work with you on any major issues you might have. If you update any profile information on the website make sure you log out and back on to the app so it can sync properly.

Interesting. Can you send a message to motokochan (at) animeneko (dot) net with some more details like the number of items on your list? We can see about reproducing the issue and maybe getting a fix in if it's not to difficult. - Michael

title: Supurb
comment: Nexus 5.   9/10 only needs ability to view friends MALs.
Clean and smoother then others

title: Simple!
comment: Easy to use, I even prefer using this app than updating my animes on the web!

title: Fantastic
comment: This is the only MAL at current that seems to update and stay updated on the app as well.

title: Has Everything I Need
comment: What could make it better is more styles of displaying lists. We don't necessarily need cover art on it. Just offer a name only option as well.

title: Crash
comment: I just downloaded this and when I opened it, it already crashes and Forced close. And everytime I open it, it keeps crashing. I downloaded this in hoping that I don't have to use my laptop to open the site manually, and it turns out like this . Huhhhh . Please fix

Did you submit a crash report? If not, please do. It's the only way we can see the problem you are having. You can also send a message to AtarashiiApp on Twitter, or mail me at motokochan (at) animeneko (dot) net and I'll try to help you out. - Michael
Sorry for my late review update ,it works smoothly now. Thanks!

We've just made some changes on our API to work around the problems with MAL. There may still be problems, but it will hopefully work until MAL can fix their services. Please do give the application a try now. If you have any issues, let us know. - Michael

title: Thanks
comment: for major update more usefull for me
Loving the new app everything is soooo much easier

title: Best MAL Client on Android!!
comment: Only thing this app is missing is more editing options for the manga and anime you're watching, like tags, etc.
Our API currently doesn't support those things. We're working on adding it, though! - Michael

title: Nom
comment: Works perfectly~

title: Great app
comment: Sleek and modern app. UI looks amazing. Best MAL app to get. Now being able to looks at your profile and most popular anime, it gets better and better. Very helpful support also. Keep up with the good work!
With some troubleshooting, it looks like an issue with an API update broke some things. This should be fixed now. - Michael

title: Great app
comment: I love this app, its the best MAL app on Android. Update fixed the kinks!
Version 1.4 was just posted. If that doesn't fix your issues, please let us know. You can send a message to AtarashiiApp on Twitter, or mail me at motokochan (at) animeneko (dot) net.

title: Search
comment: Search could be improved, it doesn't return results unless you write the exact name of the anime/manga. Edit - update just fixed this, thanks!

We're using the same search results MAL would provide (in fact, it's using the same mechanism as the website). Are there differences when searching between the two? We'd love to get it fixed if so. You can send a message to AtarashiiApp on Twitter, or mail me at motokochan (at) animeneko (dot) net. - Michael

title: Simple and and Clean!
comment: Very clean and easy on the eyes. However images don't load for me =( EDIT: Beta works fine. *gives a thumbs up*
Glad to hear that works. If image loading continues to be an issue with 1.3, let us know. - Michael

title: Nice app
comment: Better than the other MAL apps that I used, only missing the feature to show the sequels lhe anime hás. Good job!

title: Best
comment: The best myanimelist app for android i've ever use so far. Widget for this app will make this app perfect.

title: Nearly there
comment: A good app, but missing a few features i regularly use. Please add links to any sequels that each anime has, and also allow addition of start and end dates of each anime. The addition of these 2 features will make it the best app on the market for me.

Not currently supported by the API we're using, but that's being worked on. We've built our own API from scratch for upcoming 1.4 and will be extending support for those options in 1.5 and beyond. - Michael

title: Crashes a lot
comment: This app is great when It wants to be but it crashes a lot on my Samsung s4
Version 1.4 is now out. If you haven't tried it yet, please do. It should fix a lot of issues. Our contributors did a lot of work stabilizing things. - Michael

title: Unable to search.
comment: So I think the API is broken because I can't seem to search for anything...
We just patched our API for the change at MAL and search along with related items should be working again. Sorry for the inconvenience. - Michael

title: AnimeFun
comment: I like it

title: Best MAL app available
comment: It has a really nice interface and it's simple to use. The only thing I'd like to see added is having the app automatically add the date started/completed when you set a show to watching or completed.

This depends on the API supporting the feature, which it currently doesn't do. We've re-written the API we use and will be adding support in it and then in this application in a few versions. - Michael

title: good!
comment: i wish the app was more appealing to the eye and has beautiful and stunning layout 😍 only then i will give it 5/5
Send us some examples of what you want to see by using the "contact developer" link on the store page. - Michael

title: Great !
comment: I love Atarashii's layout, it's simple and useful. Thank you for fixing the glitches. (^_^) But if I can give a suggestion, you could add things like "Start Date/Finish Date" and an easy way to find relative stories (sequels, side stories, etc) so we can know if the anime/manga we're following has some kind of continuation.  Thanks in advance and keep up the good work ! (^_^)

The start and finish dates need API support, which we're working on providing. It's my number 1 feature want as I use it and know how annoying it is to have to set it on the site. The other details just need a nice way to be presented without taking up a ton of space. I'm sure we'll get to that eventually. - Michael

title: Manga problem
comment: Great!, everything is working fine except when I click on any manga the app crashes and closes, other than that everything else is working without trouble.
Version 1.3.1 was just published that works with the new MyAnimeList whitelist. Please give it a try once it updates for you.

title: Wont work ;_;
comment: The apl force closes each time I start it, im guessing cos of my phone Os version.
Contact us and we'll be happy to look over your issue. If it installed on your phone, it should work okay, even if your Android is a bit old. We test all the way back to 2.2. - Michael

title: Almost Perfect
comment: It's the best mal app I've seen so far. The only thing missing is a link to open a selected anime/manga in the mal website.
That'll be available in version 1.4 when it's ready. If you want to see the new features, feel free to try the beta version, also listed on the play store. - Michael

title: Best MAL client for android. 'nuff said.
Great app!
comment: Beautiful layout, better than every other MAL app I've seen. Intuitive, clean functionality. Crashes/force close issues seem to be non-existent in the latest version. Excellent!
I'm glad to hear it's now working for you. - Michael

title: Amazing
comment: I Really Love The App, I Only Wish If There's A "Related" Tab Or Something So When I Finish An Anime It Shows Me Its OVAs, Movies Etc Instead Of Me Having To Look Each Anime Individually
We can certainly look into this for a future feature. - Michael

title: Extremely helpful
comment: It's so great not to have to login through the mobile browser or go onto my computer. The UI is very modern too!

title: Fast and simple layout
comment: One of the best MAL apps for Android out there. It would be great if we could view the stats for each anime, like summary of how many people watched, user ratings, friend's ratings and character list. Review posts from others would be nice.
Thanks for the feedback. We're still working on the small bugs. What statistics would you like to see that aren't displayed? (Michael)

title: Epic
comment: Keep it up guys

title: one very slick MAL client
comment: This is one of the best my anime list client's I have seen and to think it's BSD-licensed as well sweet.

title: Crashes often
comment: I like the interface and the look of the application quite a bit.  Unfortunately the app crashes far too often.

Please make sure to file crash reports if you can, we do investigate them. Also, try the beta version of the application, also in the store. There have been quite a few modifications to it and your issues may be fixed there. (Michael)

It seems there are still some issues to work out, unfortunately. We're working on possible solutions to some of the trouble MAL itself is having. For now, try clearing application data and logging in again. -Michael

title: Great App

Unfortunately, MAL's search (which is what we're using) isn't all that good. If you have any ideas on how to work it better, please let us know using the contact info on the listing. -Michael

title: Beautiful, Functional
comment: The best looking and most functional MAL app for Android. Makes all of them on here and iOS look awful in comparison. However searching crashes the app regularly.
We're working on stabilizing the whole API communication thing. -Michael

title: Amazing
comment: Definately the best MAL mobile app out of all of the ones I've tried. I really do recommend this app for MAL users that want mobile access to their lists quickly. Sync is quick even on big lists and design is great. Thanks devs! ^^

title: Impressed by improvements
comment: *updated review* Wow a massive improvement, ill use this app as my main MAL driver for now, as other apps are having sync problems, this app sync perfectly and runs relatively quick, runs very quickly on my nexus 7 (2013) a little slower on my galaxy s3 but the hardware is old so I can't l blame it. The only down side is lack of editing options like comments and priority which is available on the MAL website itself and some of the other apps. Will give it a perfect score when those options are out.

It might be due to a large list. Have you sent in reports on your issue? Also, feel free to put in a comment on our G+ community and we'll try to figure out what's going on to get the application working for you. (Michael)

title: Great little app, please keep up the good work
comment: Just as a small suggestion when viewing detailed anime information, I think it would be good to scroll down rather than across if it doesn't fit (nexus 7)

title: It works!
comment: None of the other MAL apps work for me... But this one does and it looks like it actually gets updated

Thank you for the nice words! Recently, MyAnimeList started requiring whitelisting of third-party applications due to some denial of service attacks against the site, and we were able to be whitelisted. If you have any feature suggestions, please let us know on our G+ community. (Michael)

title: Nice
comment: Thanks For The Fix Great App
Version 1.3.1 was just published that works with the new MyAnimeList whitelist. We will consider adding new editable fields once we re-do the API backend.

Have you reported the issues? Since the fix to a whitelisted API endpoint, it shouldn't be having so many problems.

title: Nice
comment: Nice app, but in the last time it becomes crash. I see your comments about MAL problems. Hope they'll fix them soon.

title: Excellent apps!!
comment: This app is great over all but it still need a bit of improvement. Please add the ability to edit the starting/ending date for anime entries. That's would have made this app to be one of the best MAL apps in the play store.

title: Almost perfect.
comment: I really love this app, and after trying out several other MAL android apps this is definitely the one for me.   It's contemporary and stylish, easy to understand too. The only thing that prevents me from perfectly is that it can be very bugged at times. The current bug is the FCing every time I sync, or open,  a listing.  I'm not sure if this is to do with the temperamental MAL servers, or a bug in the application itself;  Either way please fix it, because it's a shame that I can't use it right now.

title: Would be the best
comment: Its really great overall and satisfies my needs greatly but when i scroll to my ptw list it frozes and crashes. I had over 300 anime in there if thats the problem. Tried on both GS3 and Note 10.1 and sent reports from both of them. It always crashes. Ill make it 5 stars after this is solved. Great job. Edit:an anime was the source of the problem. (.hack liminality)

title: Just the ratings >.<
comment: This is by far my favourite MAL app. However, the 5 star rating doesn't match my ratings on MAL. (Score 9 doesn't translate to 4.5 stars).

title: Great, Effective and Simple!
comment: I've been using MAL for Android for a while, but it was sad that it didn't receive updates anymore. A few hours ago I stumbled upon this app and I couldn't be happier!  It has a great design and a sweet interface, it's fast and really easy to use! It's also great that there's still work being done on it. Please keep up your great work!  Do you think it'd be possible to see prequels/sequels and recommendations on the DetailView?

title: Great but can be better
comment: Working great! Awesome layout makes it my favourite MAL app. Would love to have the mangas showing if they have an anime, also needs an icon do open MAL on your browser, give me that and I'll give you the extra star.

There have been some major problems with MyAnimeList due to a DDoS. Unfortunately, it caused our application to crash when trying to get data from the site. Please try again and let us know if you keep having issues. (Michael)

title: Used to work
comment: The latest version FCs when trying to sync.  Edit: I'm looking forward to seeing it fixed. MAL had been a target of hackers again, so the site is still kind of buggy to use. I guess MALO is stable and immune to all of this because they are using different API.

There have been some problems lately with both MAL and the API we use. Unfortunately, it's causing the application to crash. We're working on some protections to prevent the crashing, but we ask that you be patient until we can fix this. (Michael)

title: Great... But
comment: Hi, this app looks great, however, it would be even better if you could add the option to add or edit the anime Start Date and End Date. MALO for Android, for instance, has this option, which works great and it's very useful

Unfortunately, that's not available in the API we're using, which is the Unofficial MAL API. We plan to contribute to improve the API so our application can be much richer in the data it can update. (Michael)

title: Excellent application
comment: Good job man, only thing I could say is... maybe the ability to edit favorites and what not?

We are a bit constrained in what we can do in the API we're using, and screen scraping would be a really poor option. The official MAL API is pretty bad, and the unofficial one we use is much nicer but limited. However, if it's possible to do with the API, it'll be implemented eventually. (Michael)

title: Great
comment: Great mal client !

title: So this is the beauty of an app
comment: Amazing just amazing

comment: ;). Good

comment: The Interface looks amazing, and everything is buttery smooth.

title: Beautiful app
comment: This app is one contemporary piece of art in design compared to a lot of other apps I've seen. You've done great in the design and ease of use. I love it!
Good news! 1.3 is rolling out right now that adds search & add directly from Atarashii! We hope you'll love it! (Chris)

Adding will be possible through the search features coming in the 1.3 release. (Michael)

title: Awsome !

title: Just about perfect!

title: Excellent app
comment: Hey met you at a tournament at first i thought you were a littlw cocky but you supported your cockyness so good reveiw from me.

title: Pretty cool, but it can be better!
comment: This is the best MAL client I've found in terms of both design and functionality. However, Atarashii! lacks a basic feature: the ability to search the MAL database to read info about new anime/add it to your list. Add that single feature, and you'll have the best MAL client there is!
Actually, there is a beta version you can try out right now with the feature available. It's in testing as we still have kinks to work out, but you can use it right now!

comment: Looks smooth and pretty to me. Pretty content.

title: Brilliantly crafted
comment: Definitely the best MAL app out there. Follows the Android Design Guidelines very well, and the results speak for themselves.

title: Great!
comment: Will be nice if we can search database and add new titles in.

title: Nice app but
comment: It needs support for re-watching. No longer crashes often

title: Search
comment: The only thing missing to make this app perfect is the ability to search and add anime and manga, if that's added I'd be even willing to put money on a donate version of this

title: Best available MAL app
comment: just a few things missing like searching for animes/mangas which will come soon i'm sure

title: Finally the perfect app for MAL
comment: I absolutely love how the app is designed. Best MAL app on the market. I've tried them all so don't waste your time download this app right now.

title: How do I ADD anime / manga to my list?
comment: I can't seem to find the option to add anime shows to my list using this client. Other than that, the app's cover view looks impressive!

title: Supposed to be no problem..
comment: It used to be no problem but recently, whenever i delete entry in my animelist.. The entry is still there in Atarashii anime list. It's kinda annoying and BTW, when manga part will be available..?!

title: Looking good
comment: Looks very good so far, I just hope all the other functionality that MAL offers will be included soon as well (searching anime,forums etc)

title: Great interface; needs more function!
comment: App works great and looks great, but I would really like to search and add anime to my list, as I do that almost as often as I change an existing list entry's details. "Everything you'd come to expect from a MAL app is present" -- I would consider searching and adding anime part of this...

title: R
comment: Grid view is not good. Most of the titles can't fit into small box. Make an option for list view with the same height preview thumbnails but wider and or place short description or view status on the right side.

title: Looking good
comment: The "switch list" button should have radio buttons instead of checkboxes. I thought I could have a few lists displayed at once, as checkboxes suggest. When viewed in landscape mode, images are stretched to fill the screen. It looks fine in portrait, but not in landscape.

title: Love the update
comment: List of anime needs to support triple digit episode numbers. "Bleach completed at: 36" ;)

title: "Made because the other apps suck"
comment: I love the UI and the overall design. Sure, some features are missing like a search function, adding new animes or general manga support, but I'm certain that these features will be added soon :) Thanks for this beautiful app!

title: Nice holo style
comment: This MAL app is pretty much all I need. Just a quick mobile interface for me to +1 the shows I watch on the road. I have a simple request for the dev, _please_ allow me to order my shows alphabetically. As of now there is no way to order the lists that you see. Thanks!

title: No manga list and no option to add entries
comment: Apart from the possibility to add new entries to your list, and the fact that you cannot view your manga list at all, this is a promising new MAL client for android. Looking forward to future updates.

title: Missing search functionality
comment: Great app, the only thing missing is search functionality for adding anime to one of my lists. I sure hope this going to be in one of next updates. I'm loving the app so far, keep up the great work!

title: Great potential
comment: Can't wait to see where you go with this! Love the interface.

title: Finally a quality MAL app
comment: Thank you so much for this app. I'm looking forward to the updates. There are two things I would like to have added in the future. Thumbnail in the list and ability to see user stats.

title: Yes!
comment: You must continue!

title: Awesome
comment: No one thought to do this for iOS, but this Android client is just fantastic. Looking forward to future updates!

title: Nice work
comment: Looking forward to this. At least someone can create perfect MAL app.

title: Decee
comment: Works weally well! I love it *-*
